i18n.components.landing_tech_banner.open: Nothing that Scribe builds would be possible without open data from Wikidata, so we're dedicated to working in the open. Please join us on GitHub and Matrix if you'd like to contribute to or learn more about our projects.

i18n.pages.docs.about.community.section_: Thank you to all of our amazing
i18n.pages.docs.about.imprint.imprint_im: An information i with a circle around it.
i18n.pages.docs.about.support_us.join_im: A circle with an opening that an arrow is going into from the left signifying people joining the Scribe community.
i18n.pages.docs.conjugate.learn_more.ben: With a simple, intuitive interface, the app lets you search for any verb and see its full conjugation across tenses and moods. Whether you're writing, speaking, or studying, Scribe makes it easy to find the right form, understand patterns, and improve your language skills. Seamlessly integrated with the Scribe ecosystem, it works alongside our keyboards and data tools for a complete language experience.
i18n.pages.docs.conjugate.learn_more.fea: Comprehensive verb conjugations for many world languages.
Quick search and instant results for any verb form.
Clear, easy-to-read tables for all tenses and moods.
Helpful tips and explanations for irregular verbs and tricky forms.
Works together with Scribe keyboards and data tools for a unified language learning experience.
i18n.pages.docs.conjugate.learn_more.int: The Scribe Conjugation App is your personal assistant for mastering verb forms in multiple languages. Designed for language learners and multilingual users, it provides instant access to accurate verb conjugations, helping you communicate with confidence and precision.
i18n.pages.docs.data.learn_more.benefits: Our data covers a wide range of languages and is carefully curated for quality and reliability. Whether youâ€™re typing, learning, or exploring new languages, Scribe-Data works behind the scenes to deliver helpful suggestions, correct forms, and relevant informationâ€”making your Scribe experience smarter and more enjoyable.
i18n.pages.docs.data.learn_more.feature_: Comprehensive language coverage for many world languages.
Accurate and regularly updated linguistic information.
Supports keyboards, conjugation, and other Scribe features.
Data sourced from trusted, open repositories like Wikidata.
Enhances your experience with smart suggestions and reliable results.
i18n.pages.docs.data.learn_more.intro_pa: Scribe-Data is the heart of the Scribe ecosystem, providing the rich linguistic information that powers our keyboards, conjugation tools, and more. By gathering and organizing language data from trusted sources, Scribe-Data ensures that every feature you use is accurate, up-to-date, and tailored to your needs.
i18n.pages.docs.index.docs_description: Learn about Scribe applications and our community.
i18n.pages.docs.keyboard_apps.learn_more: Easy language switching for multilingual users.
Built-in translation and verb conjugation tools.
Smart suggestions for correct spelling, grammar, and word choice.
Seamless integration with all your favorite apps and devices.
Support for a growing list of world languages, with more added regularly.

Scribe Language Keyboards are smart, user-friendly keyboards designed to make typing in different languages easy and enjoyable. Whether you're learning a new language or communicating with friends and colleagues around the world, Scribe keyboards help you express yourself accurately and confidently, right from your device.

With Scribe, you can seamlessly switch between languages, access helpful tools like translation and conjugation, and enjoy a typing experience tailored to your needs. Our keyboards are built to integrate smoothly with your favorite apps and devices, supporting a wide range of languages and offering features that make multilingual communication effortless.
i18n.pages.docs.legal.privacy_policy.pri: A shield with a check in the middle of it to indicate that the user is safe using Scribe software.
i18n.pages.docs.server.available_data.cl: An icon of a clipboard with a bar chart representing data on it
i18n.pages.docs.server.learn_more.benefi: With Scribe-Server, you benefit from fast performance, automatic updates, and synchronized access to language services across all your devices. The server infrastructure works quietly in the background, so you can focus on learning, communicating, and exploring languagesâ€”knowing that Scribe is always ready to help.
i18n.pages.docs.server.learn_more.featur: Reliable access to language tools and resources, anytime and anywhere.
Automatic updates to keep your features and data current.
Fast, responsive performance for a smooth user experience.
Secure and private connection for your language activities.
Seamless integration with all Scribe apps and services.
i18n.pages.docs.server.learn_more.intro_: Scribe-Server is the backbone of the Scribe ecosystem, ensuring that all your language tools and resources are always available when you need them. By connecting your devices to a secure and reliable server, Scribe-Server delivers up-to-date features, data, and support for a seamless user experience. Scribe-Server is hosted on Toolforge and uses MariaDB to manage and deliver language data efficiently.
i18n.pages.docs.server.learn_more.page_h: Scribe-Server: Reliable Language Services for Everyone
i18n.pages.index.conjugate_aria_label: Learn more about the Scribe conjugation applications
i18n.pages.index.conjugate_text: We're developing advanced verb conjugation applications based on open data. Get all verb conjugations found in Wikidata in a streamlined UI that lets you search for verbs in multiple languages at the same time. All this without ads or your data going to third parties.
i18n.pages.index.data_aria_label: Learn more about the Scribe-Data project
i18n.pages.index.data_text: Our Wikidata language data processes are open for all to use. Leverage Scribe-Data to get language packs of all data from the Wikidata Query Service or Wikidata dumps in a convenient Python command line interface.
i18n.pages.index.language_keyboards_aria: Learn more about the Scribe language keyboard applications
i18n.pages.index.language_keyboards_text: Our flagship application is Scribe Language Keyboards â€” mobile keyboards that are tailored to help language learners communicate in their second language. Scribe keyboards can be used in any app and help users with translation, verb conjugation, noun genders and much more!
i18n.pages.index.our_supporters_text: Help us create and maintain our open-source language learning software. Please consider contributing your skills, reach or money.
i18n.pages.index.scribe_community_img_al: A globe graphic with icons representing development, design, translation, communication and teamwork.
i18n.pages.index.scribe_section_btn_aria: Learn more about the Scribe community
i18n.pages.index.scribe_section_text: We're a global community of language enthusiasts, learners and developers creating tools to help people communicate with confidence. An official Wikimedia project for new developers, we strive to create an inclusive environment in all aspects of our work.
i18n.pages.index.server_aria_label: Learn more about the Scribe-Server project
i18n.pages.index.server_text: You can also make calls to the Scribe-Server API that our client applications use to get language data updates. Get structured data on demand via a fast and reliable service.
i18n.pages.index.title: Welcome
